Object.Name: Actuation
Object.Description1: This IPSO object is dedicated to remote actuation such as ON/OFF action or dimming. A multi-state output can also be described as a string. This is useful to send pilot wire orders for instance. It also provides a resource to reflect the time that the device has been switched on.

Item.Name: Dimmer
Item.Description: This resource represents a light dimmer setting, which has an Integer value between 0 and 100 as a percentage.

Item.Name: On Time
Item.Description: The time in seconds that the device has been on. Writing a value of 0 resets the counter.

Item.Name: Muti-state Output
Item.Description: A string describing a state for multiple level output such as Pilot Wire

Item.Name: Application Type
Item.Description: The Application type of the device, for example “Motion Closure”.
